de.tschebbischeff.visualizer

Class GlVisualizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tschebbischeff.visualizer.GlVisualizer

  • public class GlVisualizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Visualizes the orbits and planets in an OpenGL frame.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Tarek

    • Field Summary

      How much the camera is turned horizontally.

      • window

        private long window
        The handle for the OpenGL window.

      • WINDOW_HEIGHT

        private final int WINDOW_HEIGHT
        The height of the created window.

      • WINDOW_WIDTH

        private final int WINDOW_WIDTH
        The width of the created window.

      • shaderManager

        private ShaderManager shaderManager
        Object of a class that handles loading, compiling and using shaders from the shaders folder.

      • colorOrder

        private java.awt.Color[] colorOrder
        The order in which the orbits and celestial bodies are colored.

      • orbitColorIndex

        private int orbitColorIndex
        The next index to use for orbit coloring.

      • celestialBodyColorIndex

        private int celestialBodyColorIndex
        The next index to use for celestial body coloring.

      • celestialBodies

        private java.util.HashMap<CelestialBody,java.lang.Integer> celestialBodies
        The celestial bodies to draw and their VAOs

      • celestialBodyVertexCounts

        private java.util.HashMap<CelestialBody,java.lang.Integer> celestialBodyVertexCounts
        The number of vertices of a celestial bodies icosphere.

      • orbits

        private java.util.HashMap<Orbit,java.lang.Integer> orbits
        The orbits to draw and their VAOs

      • orbitResolution

        private int orbitResolution
        Orbit resolution, how many vertices per orbit should be drawn. There will be (2^orbitResolution) vertices to build the elliptical orbit. orbitResolution has to be at least 3.

      • celestialBodyResolution

        private int celestialBodyResolution
        Celestial body resolution, how many angles per sphere should be drawn. celestialBodyResolution has to be at least 1.

      • visualizationSpeed

        private double visualizationSpeed
        The speed with which to accelerate time for the simulation.

      • orbitColorAlpha

        private float orbitColorAlpha
        The alpha to draw orbits with.

      • celestialBodyColorAlpha

        private float celestialBodyColorAlpha
        The alpha to draw celestial bodies with.

      • currentTime

        private double currentTime
        The current time in the simulation.

      • cameraTranslation

        private Vector3d cameraTranslation
        The camera translation

      • cameraAzimuth

        private double cameraAzimuth
        How much the camera is turned horizontally.

      • cameraZenith

        private double cameraZenith
        How much the camera is turned vertically.

      • cameraRotation

        private Quat4d cameraRotation
        The cameras total current orientation.

      • cameraSpeed

        private double cameraSpeed
        The speed with which the camera moves.

      • cameraTurnSpeed

        private double cameraTurnSpeed
        The speed with which the camera turns.

        The cursors x-position.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GlVisualizer

        public GlVisualizer(int windowWidth,
                    int windowHeight)
        Creates a new GlVisualizer object. The visualization can be started with the run method.
        Parameters:
        windowWidth - The width of the created window.
        windowHeight - The height of the created window.

    • Method Detail

      • setColorOrder

        public GlVisualizer setColorOrder(java.awt.Color[] colorOrder)
        Sets the color order to use for the visualization. The color order determines in which color the orbits and bodies are drawn.
        Parameters:
        colorOrder - The new color order to use for the orbits and bodies.
        Returns:
        This GlVisualizer for fluent method calls.

      • setOrbitResolution

        public GlVisualizer setOrbitResolution(int resolution)
        Sets the resolution to draw the orbits with. A total of 2^resolution vertices will be drawn for each orbit. The minimum value is three.
        Parameters:
        resolution - The new resolution to use for orbit drawing.
        Returns:
        This GlVisualizer for fluent method calls.

      • setCelestialBodyResolution

        public GlVisualizer setCelestialBodyResolution(int resolution)
        Sets the resolution to draw the celestial bodies with. The minimum value is 0.
        Parameters:
        resolution - The new resolution to use for body drawing.
        Returns:
        This GlVisualizer for fluent method calls.

      • setVisualizationSpeed

        public GlVisualizer setVisualizationSpeed(double speed)
        Sets the speed with which celestial bodies are animated along their orbits. 1.0 means real time.
        Parameters:
        speed - The new speed to animate bodies with.
        Returns:
        This GlVisualizer for fluent method calls.

      • getVisualizationSpeed

        public double getVisualizationSpeed()
        Gets the speed with which celestial bodies and orbits are animated along their orbits. 1.0 means real time.
        Returns:
        The speed with which bodies are animated.

      • setOrbitColorAlpha

        public GlVisualizer setOrbitColorAlpha(float alpha)
        Sets the alpha value with which orbits are drawn.
        Parameters:
        alpha - The alpha value for orbits.
        Returns:
        This GlVisualizer for fluent method calls.

      • setCelestialBodyColorAlpha

        public GlVisualizer setCelestialBodyColorAlpha(float alpha)
        Sets the alpha value with which celestial bodies are drawn.
        Parameters:
        alpha - The alpha value for celestial bodies.
        Returns:
        This GlVisualizer for fluent method calls.

      • setCameraSpeed

        public GlVisualizer setCameraSpeed(double speed)
        Sets the speed with which the camera moves. A value of 1.0 means 1.0 units per second.
        Parameters:
        speed - The new speed with which the camera moves.
        Returns:
        This GlVisualizer for fluent method calls.

      • setCameraTurnSpeed

        public GlVisualizer setCameraTurnSpeed(double speed)
        Sets the speed with which the camera turns. A value of 1.0 means 1.0 degree per second per pixel.
        Parameters:
        speed - The new value with which the camera turns.
        Returns:
        This GlVisualizer for fluent method calls.

      • getCameraSpeed

        public double getCameraSpeed()
        Gets the speed with which the camera moves. A value of 1.0 means 1.0 units per second.
        Returns:
        The speed in units per second the camera moves.

      • getCameraTurnSpeed

        public double getCameraTurnSpeed()
        Gets the speed with which the camera turns. A value of 1.0 means 1.0 degrees per second.
        Returns:
        The speed in degrees per second the camera turns.

      • addOrbit

        public GlVisualizer addOrbit(Orbit orbit)
        Adds an orbit to the list of orbits that are drawn.
        Parameters:
        orbit - The orbit to add to the list.
        Returns:
        This GlVisualizer for fluent method calls.

      • addCelestialBody

        public GlVisualizer addCelestialBody(CelestialBody body)
        Adds a celestial body to the list of orbits that are drawn.
        Parameters:
        body - The body to add to the list.
        Returns:
        This GlVisualizer for fluent method calls.

      • run

        public void run()
        Shows the window and starts the visualization

      • loop

        private void loop(double deltaTime)
        Runs rendering related stuff.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - The time elapsed since the last time this method was called, in seconds.

      • drawOrbits

        private void drawOrbits()
        Draws all registered orbits

      • drawCelestialBodies

        private void drawCelestialBodies()
        Draws all registered celestial bodies

      • handleInput

        private void handleInput(double deltaTime)
        Processes mouse and continous keyboard input
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - The time passed since this method was last called.

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        Initializes OpenGL stuff.
